verses.verse: Then Joseph<WH3130> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and said,<WH559> My father<WH1> and my brethren,<WH251> and their flocks,<WH6629> and their herds,<WH1241> and all<WH3605> that<WH834> they have, are come<WH935> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667> and, behold,<WH2009> they are in the land<WH776> of Goshen.<WH1657>
And he took<WH3947> some<WH4480> <WH7097> of his brethren,<WH251> even five<WH2568> men,<WH376> and presented<WH3322> them unto<WH6440> Pharaoh.<WH6547>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto<WH413> his brethren,<WH251> What<WH4100> is your occupation?<WH4639> And they said<WH559> unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> Thy servants<WH5650> are shepherds,<WH7462> <WH6629> both<WH1571> we,<WH587> and also<WH1571> our fathers.<WH1>

They said<WH559> moreover unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> For to sojourn<WH1481> in the land<WH776> are we come;<WH935> for<WH3588> <WH834> thy servants<WH5650> have no<WH369> pasture<WH4829> for their flocks;<WH6629> for<WH3588> the famine<WH7458> is sore<WH3515> in the land<WH776> of Canaan:<WH3667> now<WH6258> therefore, we pray thee,<WH4994> let thy servants<WH5650> dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen.<WH1657>
And Pharaoh<WH6547> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Joseph,<WH3130> saying,<WH559> Thy father<WH1> and thy brethren<WH251> are come<WH935> unto<WH413> thee:

The land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> is before<WH6440> thee; in the best<WH4315> of the land<WH776> make<WH853> thy father<WH1> and brethren<WH251> to dwell;<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657> let them dwell:<WH3427> and if<WH518> thou knowest<WH3045> any men<WH376> of activity<WH2428> among them, then make<WH7760> them rulers<WH8269> over my<WH5921> <WH834> cattle.<WH4735>
And Joseph<WH3130> brought in<WH935> <WH853> Jacob<WH3290> his father,<WH1> and set<WH5975> him before<WH6440> Pharaoh:<WH6547> and Jacob<WH3290> blessed<WH1288> <WH853> Pharaoh.<WH6547>
And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Jacob,<WH3290> How<WH4100> old<WH3117> <WH8141> <WH2416> art thou?

And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> The days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of my pilgrimage<WH4033> are a hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> years:<WH8141> few<WH4592> and evil<WH7451> have the days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of my life<WH2416> been,<WH1961> and have not<WH3808> attained unto<WH5381> <WH853> the days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of my fathers<WH1> in the days<WH3117> of their pilgrimage.<WH4033>
And Jacob<WH3290> blessed<WH1288> <WH853> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and went out<WH3318> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> Pharaoh.<WH6547>

And Joseph<WH3130> placed<WH3427> <WH853> his father<WH1> and his brethren,<WH251> and gave<WH5414> them a possession<WH272> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in the best<WH4315> of the land,<WH776> in the land<WH776> of Rameses,<WH7486> as<WH834> Pharaoh<WH6547> had commanded.<WH6680>

And Joseph<WH3130> nourished<WH3557> <WH853> his father,<WH1> and his brethren,<WH251> and all<WH3605> his father's<WH1> household,<WH1004> with bread,<WH3899> according to<WH6310> their families.<WH2945>

And there was no<WH369> bread<WH3899> in all<WH3605> the land;<WH776> for<WH3588> the famine<WH7458> was very<WH3966> sore,<WH3515> so that the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> and all the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> fainted<WH3856> by reason of<WH4480> <WH6440> the famine.<WH7458>

And Joseph<WH3130> gathered up<WH3950> <WH853> all<WH3605> the money<WH3701> that was found<WH4672> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> for the corn<WH7668> which<WH834> they<WH1992> bought:<WH7666> and Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH935> <WH853> the money<WH3701> into Pharaoh's<WH6547> house.<WH1004>

And when money<WH3701> failed<WH8552> in the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and in the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> all<WH3605> the Egyptians<WH4714> came<WH935> unto<WH413> Joseph,<WH3130> and said,<WH559> Give<WH3051> us bread:<WH3899> for why<WH4100> should we die<WH4191> in thy presence?<WH5048> for<WH3588> the money<WH3701> faileth.<WH656>
And Joseph<WH3130> said,<WH559> Give<WH3051> your cattle;<WH4735> and I will give<WH5414> you for your cattle,<WH4735> if<WH518> money<WH3701> fail.<WH656>

And they brought<WH935> <WH853> their cattle<WH4735> unto<WH413> Joseph:<WH3130> and Joseph<WH3130> gave<WH5414> them bread<WH3899> in exchange for horses,<WH5483> and for the flocks,<WH4735> <WH6629> and for the cattle<WH4735> of the herds,<WH1241> and for the asses:<WH2543> and he fed<WH5095> them with bread<WH3899> for all<WH3605> their cattle<WH4735> for that<WH1931> year.<WH8141>

When that<WH1931> year<WH8141> was ended,<WH8552> they came<WH935> unto<WH413> him the second<WH8145> year,<WH8141> and said<WH559> unto him, We will not<WH3808> hide<WH3582> it from<WH4480> my lord,<WH113> how that<WH3588> <WH518> our money<WH3701> is spent;<WH8552> my lord<WH113> also hath<WH413> our herds<WH4735> of cattle;<WH929> there is not<WH3808> aught left<WH7604> in the sight<WH6440> of my lord,<WH113> but<WH1115> <WH518> our bodies,<WH1472> and our lands: <WH127>

Wherefore <WH4100> shall we die<WH4191> before thine eyes,<WH5869> both<WH1571> we<WH587> and<WH1571> our land?<WH127> buy<WH7069> us and our land<WH127> for bread,<WH3899> and we<WH587> and our land<WH127> will be<WH1961> servants<WH5650> unto Pharaoh:<WH6547> and give<WH5414> us seed,<WH2233> that we may live,<WH2421> and not<WH3808> die,<WH4191> that the land<WH127> be not desolate.<WH3456> <WH3808>

And Joseph<WH3130> bought<WH7069> <WH853> all<WH3605> the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> for Pharaoh;<WH6547> for<WH3588> the Egyptians<WH4714> sold<WH4376> every man<WH376> his field,<WH7704> because<WH3588> the famine<WH7458> prevailed<WH2388> over<WH5921> them: so the land<WH776> became<WH1961> Pharaoh's.<WH6547>
And as for the people,<WH5971> he removed<WH5674> them to cities<WH5892> from one end<WH4480> <WH7097> of the borders<WH1366> of Egypt<WH4714> even to<WH5704> the other end<WH7097> thereof.

Only <WH7535> the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> bought<WH7069> he not;<WH3808> for<WH3588> the priests<WH3548> had a portion<WH2706> assigned them of<WH4480> <WH854> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and did eat<WH398> <WH853> their portion<WH2706> which<WH834> Pharaoh<WH6547> gave<WH5414> them: wherefore<WH5921> <WH3651> they sold<WH4376> not<WH3808> <WH853> their lands.<WH127>

Then Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> Behold,<WH2005> I have bought<WH7069> you this day<WH3117> and your land<WH127> for Pharaoh:<WH6547> lo,<WH1887> here is seed<WH2233> for you, and ye shall sow<WH2232> <WH853> the land.<WH127>

And it shall come to pass<WH1961> in the increase,<WH8393> that ye shall give<WH5414> the fifth<WH2549> part unto Pharaoh,<WH6547> and four<WH702> parts<WH3027> shall be<WH1961> your own, for seed<WH2233> of the field,<WH7704> and for your food,<WH400> and for them<WH834> of your households,<WH1004> and for food<WH398> for your little ones.<WH2945>
And they said,<WH559> Thou hast saved our lives:<WH2421> let us find<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of my lord,<WH113> and we will be<WH1961> Pharaoh's<WH6547> servants.<WH5650>

And Joseph<WH3130> made<WH7760> it a law<WH2706> over<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> that Pharaoh<WH6547> should have the fifth<WH2569> part; except<WH7535> the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> only,<WH905> which became<WH1961> not<WH3808> Pharaoh's.<WH6547>

And Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in the country<WH776> of Goshen;<WH1657> and they had possessions<WH270> therein, and grew,<WH6509> and multiplied<WH7235> exceedingly.<WH3966>

And Jacob<WH3290> lived<WH2421> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> seventeen<WH7651> <WH6240> years:<WH8141> so the whole age<WH3117> <WH8141> <WH2416> of Jacob<WH3290> was<WH1961> a hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>

And the time<WH3117> drew nigh<WH7126> that Israel<WH3478> must die:<WH4191> and he called<WH7121> his son<WH1121> Joseph,<WH3130> and said<WH559> unto him, If<WH518> now<WH4994> I have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in thy sight,<WH5869> put,<WH7760> I pray thee,<WH4994> thy hand<WH3027> under<WH8478> my thigh,<WH3409> and deal<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> and truly<WH571> with<WH5973> me; bury<WH6912> me not,<WH408> I pray thee,<WH4994> in Egypt: <WH4714>

But I will lie<WH7901> with<WH5973> my fathers,<WH1> and thou shalt carry<WH5375> me out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> and bury<WH6912> me in their burial place.<WH6900> And he said,<WH559> I<WH595> will do<WH6213> as thou hast said.<WH1697>
And he said,<WH559> Swear<WH7650> unto me. And he swore<WH7650> unto him. And Israel<WH3478> bowed himself<WH7812> upon<WH5921> the bed's<WH4296> head.<WH7218>
